verses.verse: "At this <S%H384><s%> also <S%H637><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> trembles, <S%H2729><s%> And leaps <S%H9351><s%> from its place. <S%H4725><s%>
"Listen <S%H8085><s%> closely <S%H8085><s%> to the thunder <S%H7267><s%> of His voice, <S%H6963><s%> And the rumbling <S%H1899><s%> that goes <S%H3318><s%> out from His mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
"Under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> He lets <S%H8281><s%> it loose, <S%H8281><s%> And His lightning <S%H216><s%> to the ends <S%H3671><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"After <S%H310><s%> it, a voice <S%H6963><s%> roars; <S%H7580><s%> He thunders <S%H7481><s%> with His majestic <S%H1347><s%> voice; <S%H6963><s%> And He does not restrain <S%H6117><s%> the lightnings when His voice <S%H6963><s%> is heard. <S%H8085><s%>

"God <S%H410><s%> thunders <S%H7481><s%> with His voice <S%H6963><s%> wondrously, <S%H6381><s%> Doing <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> things <S%H1419><s%> which we cannot <S%H3808><s%> comprehend. <S%H3045><s%>

"For to the snow <S%H7950><s%> He says, <S%H559><s%> 'Fall <S%H9094><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%>' And to the downpour <S%H1653><s%> <S%H4306><s%> and the rain, <S%H1653><s%> <S%H4306><s%> 'Be strong. <S%H5797><s%>'
"He seals <S%H2856><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> That all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H376><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> His work. <S%H4639><s%>
"Then the beast <S%H9130><s%> goes <S%H935><s%> into its lair, <S%H695><s%> And remains <S%H7931><s%> in its den. <S%H4585><s%>
"Out of the south <S%H2315><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> the storm, <S%H5492><s%> And out of the north <S%H2219><s%> the cold. <S%H7135><s%>
"From the breath <S%H5397><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> ice <S%H7140><s%> is made, <S%H5414><s%> And the expanse <S%H7341><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> is frozen. <S%H4164><s%>
"Also <S%H637><s%> with moisture <S%H7377><s%> He loads <S%H2959><s%> the thick <S%H5645><s%> cloud; <S%H5645><s%> He disperses <S%H6327><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of His lightning. <S%H216><s%>

"And it changes <S%H4524><s%> direction, <S%H4524><s%> turning <S%H2015><s%> around <S%H2015><s%> by His guidance, <S%H8458><s%> That it may do <S%H6466><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> He commands <S%H6680><s%> it On the face <S%H6440><s%> of the inhabited <S%H8398><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>
"Whether <S%H518><s%> for correction, <S%H7626><s%> or <S%H518><s%> for His world, <S%H776><s%> Or <S%H518><s%> for lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> He causes it to happen. <S%H4672><s%>
"Listen <S%H238><s%> to this, <S%H384><s%> O Job, <S%H347><s%> Stand <S%H5975><s%> and consider <S%H995><s%> the wonders <S%H6381><s%> of God. <S%H410><s%>
"Do you know <S%H3045><s%> how God <S%H433><s%> establishes <S%H7760><s%> them, And makes the lightning <S%H216><s%> of His cloud <S%H6051><s%> to shine <S%H3313><s%>?

"Do you know <S%H3045><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> the layers <S%H4657><s%> of the thick <S%H5645><s%> clouds, <S%H5645><s%> The wonders <S%H4652><s%> of one perfect <S%H8549><s%> in knowledge, <S%H1843><s%>
You whose <S%H834><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> are hot, <S%H2525><s%> When the land <S%H776><s%> is still <S%H8252><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of the south <S%H1864><s%> wind?
"Can you, with Him, spread <S%H7554><s%> out the skies, <S%H7834><s%> Strong <S%H2389><s%> as a molten <S%H3332><s%> mirror <S%H7209><s%>?
"Teach <S%H3045><s%> us what <S%H4100><s%> we shall say <S%H559><s%> to Him; We cannot <S%H3808><s%> arrange <S%H6186><s%> [our case] because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
"Shall it be told <S%H5608><s%> Him that I would speak <S%H1696><s%>? Or <S%H518><s%> should a man <S%H376><s%> say <S%H559><s%> that he would be swallowed <S%H1104><s%> up?

"And now <S%H6258><s%> men do not see <S%H7200><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is bright <S%H925><s%> in the skies; <S%H7834><s%> But the wind <S%H7307><s%> has passed <S%H5674><s%> and cleared <S%H2891><s%> them.
"Out of the north <S%H6828><s%> comes <S%H857><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> [splendor;] Around <S%H5921><s%> God <S%H433><s%> is awesome <S%H3372><s%> majesty. <S%H1935><s%>

"The Almighty <S%H7706><s%> â€“ we cannot <S%H3808><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> Him; He is exalted <S%H7689><s%> in power; <S%H3581><s%> And He will not do <S%H6031><s%> violence <S%H6031><s%> to justice <S%H4941><s%> and abundant <S%H7230><s%> righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
"Therefore <S%H3651><s%> men <S%H376><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> Him; He does not regard <S%H7200><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> who are wise <S%H2450><s%> of heart. <S%H3820><s%>"
